instructions: From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Settings . Tap Spam filter to select the check box. Tap Manage spam numbers . Manually enter number and tap the + plus sign or choose from Inbox or Contacts. When finished, tap the back arrow.
From any Home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the conversation thread from the number you want to block. Tap the Add to spam numbers icon in the top right-hand corner.

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Settings . Tap Spam filter to select the check box. Tap Manage spam numbers . Tap the minus sign next to the number you want to remove. When finished, tap the back arrow.
From any Home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the conversation thread from the number you want to unblock. Tap the Remove from spam in the top right-hand corner.
From any Home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the message you wish to delete. Tap DELETE . Tap DELETE .
From any Home screen, tap Messages . If necessary, expand the conversation to view the individual messages. Touch and hold the message you wish to delete. Tap DELETE . Tap DELETE .

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the conversation thread containing the message you want to save. Touch and hold the picture you want to save. Tap Save attachment . Tap the file name to select the the check box. Tap Save . The image is now stored in your Gallery in the 'download' folder.
From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Text messages . View the number under Message center .
